oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bell Avenue Baptist Church
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Earle Harrison, Knoxville
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bell Avenue Baptist Church, "Amoma Blameless Life" women's group, posing in front of the old, pre-fire (1912) church. Mrs. Nannie J. Wilds identified on back as teacher, Rev. J.H. Sharp (not shown) as pastor (Sept. 3, 1905-April 1912). Knoxville, TN. 26 women shown in close up pose by Earle Harrison, Knoxville.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baptist churches; Religious groups; Group portraits; Women;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
